question.questionText: Below are pictures of wind instruments. You blow air through them to produce sounds. Why does [the saxophone] make the lowest sounds?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The saxophone has the longest and fattest tube.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Because the bigger it is the lower the sound.
I think it makes a low sound because it has a little hole so the sound can get through.
Because it has to travel a long distance.
The sound goes a long distance.
